00011 const double kYPMilesPerLongitude = 69.16022727272727;
00012 const double kYPMilesPerLatitude = 68.70795454545454;
00013 
00014 // Represents NULL CLLocationCoordinate2D
00015 const CLLocationCoordinate2D GHCLLocationCoordinate2DNull = {DBL_MAX, DBL_MAX};
00016 
00017 CLLocationDistance YPLatLngDistance(CLLocationCoordinate2D c1, CLLocationCoordinate2D c2) { 
00018   double radius = 6371; // Earthâ€™s radius in Kilometers
00019   CLLocationDegrees latitudeDiff = GHDegreesToRadians(c2.latitude - c1.latitude);  
00020   CLLocationDegrees longitudeDiff = GHDegreesToRadians(c2.longitude - c1.longitude);
00021   double nA = pow(sin(latitudeDiff/2), 2) + cos(GHDegreesToRadians(c1.latitude)) * cos(GHDegreesToRadians(c2.latitude)) * pow (sin(longitudeDiff/2), 2);
00022   double nC = 2 * atan2(sqrt(nA), sqrt(1 - nA));
00023   return radius * nC; 
00024 }
00025 
00026 BOOL GHCLLocationCoordinate2DIsNull(CLLocationCoordinate2D coordinate) {
00027   return coordinate.latitude == GHCLLocationCoordinate2DNull.latitude && coordinate.longitude == GHCLLocationCoordinate2DNull.longitude;
00028 }
00029 
00030 double GHDegreesToRadians(double val) {
00031   return val * (M_PI/180);
00032 }
00033 
00034 double GHRadiansToDegrees(double val) {
00035   return val * (180/M_PI);
00036 }
00037 
00038 CLLocationCoordinate2D GHLocationAtDistance(CLLocationCoordinate2D coordinate, CLLocationDistance distance, double bearingInRadians) {
00039   double lat1 = GHDegreesToRadians(coordinate.latitude);
00040   double lon1 = GHDegreesToRadians(coordinate.longitude);
00041   
00042   double a = 6378137, b = 6356752.3142, f = 1/298.257223563;  // WGS-84 ellipsiod
00043   double s = distance;
00044   double alpha1 = bearingInRadians;
00045   double sinAlpha1 = sin(alpha1);
00046   double cosAlpha1 = cos(alpha1);
00047   
00048   double tanU1 = (1 - f) * tan(lat1);
00049   double cosU1 = 1 / sqrt((1 + tanU1 * tanU1));
00050   double sinU1 = tanU1 * cosU1;
00051   double sigma1 = atan2(tanU1, cosAlpha1);
00052   double sinAlpha = cosU1 * sinAlpha1;
00053   double cosSqAlpha = 1 - sinAlpha * sinAlpha;
00054   double uSq = cosSqAlpha * (a * a - b * b) / (b * b);
00055   double A = 1 + uSq / 16384 * (4096 + uSq * (-768 + uSq * (320 - 175 * uSq)));
00056   double B = uSq / 1024 * (256 + uSq * (-128 + uSq * (74 - 47 * uSq)));
00057   
00058   double sigma = s / (b * A);
00059   double sigmaP = 2 * M_PI;
00060   
00061   double cos2SigmaM, sinSigma, cosSigma;
00062   
00063   while(abs(sigma - sigmaP) > 1e-12) {
00064     cos2SigmaM = cos(2 * sigma1 + sigma);
00065     sinSigma = sin(sigma);
00066     cosSigma = cos(sigma);
00067     double deltaSigma = B * sinSigma * (cos2SigmaM + B / 4 * (cosSigma * (-1 + 2 * cos2SigmaM * cos2SigmaM) - B / 6 * cos2SigmaM * (-3 + 4 * sinSigma * sinSigma) * (-3 + 4 * cos2SigmaM * cos2SigmaM)));
00068     sigmaP = sigma;
00069     sigma = s / (b * A) + deltaSigma;
00070   }
00071   
00072   double tmp = sinU1 * sinSigma - cosU1 * cosSigma * cosAlpha1;
00073   double lat2 = atan2(sinU1 * cosSigma + cosU1 * sinSigma * cosAlpha1, (1 - f) * sqrt(sinAlpha * sinAlpha + tmp * tmp));
00074   double lambda = atan2(sinSigma * sinAlpha1, cosU1 * cosSigma - sinU1 * sinSigma * cosAlpha1);
00075   double C = f / 16 * cosSqAlpha * (4 + f * (4 - 3 * cosSqAlpha));
00076   double L = lambda - (1 - C) * f * sinAlpha * (sigma + C * sinSigma * (cos2SigmaM + C * cosSigma * (-1 + 2 * cos2SigmaM * cos2SigmaM)));
00077   
00078   double lon2 = lon1 + L;
00079   
00080   CLLocationCoordinate2D dest;
00081   dest.latitude = GHRadiansToDegrees(lat2);
00082   dest.longitude = GHRadiansToDegrees(lon2);
00083   return dest;
00084 }
